title: Final CGPA
content: If I have a 8.7 cgpa after 3 years(including 3 Special Topics= 6 credits, but excluding any internship credits) can I get it to a 9+ by graduation?

comments.body: Then the sgpa for the upcoming sem should be  9.2 or 9.4
In 7th and 8th sems do they give sgpa or are grades added like how special topics are added?
Depends some may have internship and some may have taken special topics
Cannot, assuming you also have 20 credits in final year like my batch. Even if you get 10 SGPA both sems 8.8625 will be final CGPA
